item.title: Review: My Youth Romantic Comedy Is Wrong as I Expected, Vol. 1
item.description: Time for a light novel review here. This is a pretty famous property and I remember the anime was popular when it aired, and nowadays it still has a big fanbase. I never watched the anime, although I was always curious about it.
